```{r}
cc = read.csv("C:/Users/cdiloreto/google drive/programming/Data sets and exercises/heatmap CC.csv")

library(ggmap)

## Empty Amsterdam map

amsterdam = get_map(location = "c(lon = 4.88969, lat = 52.37403)")

## easier alternative
amsterdam = get_map(location = "Amsterdam")
ggmap(amsterdam)

str(cc$office_city)
geocodes = geocode(as.character(cc$office_city))
```
